thread.title: Bad service for long stay

author: Simon T
title: Bad service for long stay
text: The hotel was clean tidy great on arrival however bedding not changes till 4day after I asked for it to be done was told yes and still not done told that if I booked on a daily bases it would be fine every day they discriminate again long stay even free water on arrival told only get it if I booked it on a daily bases daily as I boookwd if for the 7 days only get it once ?
